original_text: But to the king of Judah, who sent you to inquire of the Lord, thus shall you say to him, Thus says the Lord, the God of Israel: Regarding the words that you have heard,
korean_text: 너희를 보내어 여호와께 묻게 한 유다 왕에게는 너희가 이렇게 전하라 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 네가 들은 말을 의논하건대

sentences.original_text: But to the king of Judah,
who sent you to inquire of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께 여쭈어 보라고 너희를 보낸 왕에게는,

sentences.original_text: thus shall you say to him,
Regarding the words that you have heard,
